casebody.data:
CROWELL
v.
CROWELL 31A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 26, 2018 Thomas D. Bumgardner, Attorney at Law, for Crowell, Andrea Kirby. Amy Simpson Fiorenza, Attorney at Law, for Crowell, William Worrell.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of September 2018 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of September 2018."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 20th day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
